text: Marilena Georgiou (; born 19 June 1996) is a Cypriot footballer who plays as a midfielder. She has been a member of the Cyprus women's national team. ==Club career== On 25 September 2008, Georgiou joined Apollon Ladies FC. ==International career== Georgiou capped for Cyprus at senior level during the 2017 Aphrodite Cup, including a 1–2 loss to Latvia on 12 March 2017 in which she scored the goal of her team. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Cypriot women's footballers Category:Cyprus women's international footballers Category:Apollon Ladies F.C. players Category:Barcelona FA players
title: Marilena Georgiou
